option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
the I&Q samples of the input iqdat format file are reversed.
the input iqdat format file originated from a digital receiver.
set the number of samples to skip at the start of each sequence to skpval. The default value is taken from the IQ structure of the input iqdat format file.
set the number of receiver channels to chnnum. The default value si taken from the IQ structure of the input iqdat format file.
filename of the iqdat format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Creates a rawacf format file from an iqdat format file.

description.p: Creates a rawacf format file from an iqdat format file.
The rawacf format file is written to standard output.

example.description: Create a rawacf format file from the iqdat format file "20040830.gbr.iqdat".The rawacf format file is written to "20040830.gbr.rawacf".
